attributes.action: make Bank Holidays statutory and in addition to the current statutory holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Temporary and contract workers provide a crucial contribution to the workforce.  As the law stands, employment agencies must pay these workers the statutory holiday.  However, these workers have to take Bank Holidays out of their statutory holiday, unlike permanent workers.  This is unfair, particularly since temporary workers do not receive other benefits such as sick pay, pensions or security in employment.
